result.eng: Would you like a cup of coffee?
result.html: Ar mhaith leat cupán caifeWould you like a cup of coffee?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁaiṫ leat cupán caifeWould you like a cup of coffee?

result.eng: Would you like cream with your coffee?
result.ga: Ar mhaith leat uachtar le do chaife
result.orig: Ar mhaith leat uachtar le do chaife
result.html: Ar mhaith leat uachtar le do chaifeWould you like cream with your coffee?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁaiṫ leat uaċtar le do ċaifeWould you like cream with your coffee?

result.eng: I would rather have coffee than tea.
result.html: B'fhearr liom caife ná taeI would rather have coffee than tea.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟearr liom caife ná taeI would rather have coffee than tea.

result.eng: Which would you prefer, tea or coffee?
result.ga: Cé acu ab fhearr leat tae nó caife
result.orig: Cé acu ab fhearr leat tae nó caife
result.html: Cé acu ab fhearr leat tae nó caifeWhich would you prefer, tea or coffee?
result.ponchtml: Cé acu ab ḟearr leat tae nó caifeWhich would you prefer, tea or coffee?

result.eng: She was excited: she was working in the most pioneering café in Ireland.
result.ga: Bhí dinglis pléisiúir uirthi bhí sí ag obair sa chaife ba cheannródaí in Éirinn
result.orig: Bhí dinglis pléisiúir uirthi bhí sí ag obair sa chaife ba cheannródaí in Éirinn
result.html: Bhí dinglis pléisiúir uirthi bhí sí ag obair sa chaife ba cheannródaí in ÉirinnShe was excited: she was working in the most pioneering café in Ireland.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí dinglis pléisiúir uirṫi ḃí sí ag obair sa ċaife ba ċeannródaí in ÉirinnShe was excited: she was working in the most pioneering café in Ireland.
